__e: Life without him would not be life.
Well, this wouldn't be quite the same.
-Sure, but that wouldn't be the same.
We wouldn't be standing here talking.
I happened to be instrumental in getting the man his job.
Hey, if it wasn't for Eve, none of us would be here.
But I didn't, and I wouldn't!
- I know you wouldn't do it for yourself.
- If you ask me, I think it'd be best if...
- maybe the best thing would be for us to--
Of course, it would be better if we had a woman here.
I thought it better I should not..
You will be too if you try and make anything more out of it than that.
I figure something's better than nothing, especially with what we got.
- You said this would be better. Remember?
You're the one who said he was better.
If there were more people like you, our job would be easier.
- It would be easier than whatwe've been doing.
Please, it will be easier for you, for all of you.
It might be simpler to get him to come here.
I know it would be safe if you put the girl away but this way is even better.
You know what would make this a lot simpler?
Once he is, he'll no longer be temperamental.
How could anything be more than that?
Yes, that would be fine... if we could.
Well, that will be just fine if...
That man there-- that's Leo Kreutzer.
Of course, I wouldn't mind getting a little.
We'll just have to do that.
Of course, I wouldn't mind getting a little.
It would be nice, but it is not so!
I thought the club would be honored.
Sir, it would be an honor, if you would accompany my platoon.
I've had some good news meself.
It'd be a feather in our caps.
That makes it one of the kids.
Shall I tell you what true evil is?
It's a very magnificent thing to be the earl of Dorincourt, my lord. I know that.
However, it would be a big saving at home.
It was a mistake to get back together with you!
You're free to do so, but I think it would be a mistake.
I know it's none of my business... but you'd be makin' a mistake to run off like that. Why?
Now, why would it be a crack?
Here we are. Something like this.
It's a very magnificent thing to be the earl of Dorincourt, my lord. I know that.
